title: Camgoo - Play with your body infront of a camara
description:
What is Camgoo..?
 
 Of all your favourite PC games, one thing's for sure: you control the game or character with your mouse, joystick or keyboard - but in Camgoo it's completely different!

Avoid any need for those old, more traditional controllers - Camgoo brings your own body movements to life, as each player in turn is captured via webcam and cast into the virtual world of Camgoo. Taking the role of hero in the game's six individual scenarios, you control all the action with your own increasingly accomplished, eager moves.
Best played with a group of friends, Camgoo is the first PC based title of its kind to offer a truly active approach to game playing - simultaneously challenging gamers young and old, from both a physical and mental perspective.

Now check out Camgoo and beware - it's great fun and seriously addictive..!
